alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 3:55AM PST until January 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and wind expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches, except 8 to 16 inches in the mountains above 5500ft. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Baker County zone. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow this morning will briefly decrease this afternoon and evening. Snow will increase once again late tonight and Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
